QuestData.Title: Slagworks: Heart of the Mountain
QuestData.Description: Blackrock orcs fight like no other clan. They rely on arms and armor forged in the heart of their unnatural crucibles.$b$bDeep within the Foundry of the Blackrock clan is a furnace powered by a primal force known as the Heart of the Mountain. Destroy it, and deprive our foe of the arms they rely on.$b$bTravel to Blackrock Foundry and defeat the Heart of the Mountain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Heart of the Mountain at the Blast Furnace in Blackrock Foundry.
